title: Earthlings WeWow Day 3: Can You Dig?
description:
Mindy, Guy Raz, and Gramma G-Force are on the road in the Wow on Wheels for Day 3 of Earthlings WeWow! This time, they take a pit stop to do some digging... in the dirt! Now, it's your turn, Wowzers! Go outside and explore what's going on in the dirt near you, and just like a real scientist be sure to document your findings! Call us at 1-888-7WOW-WOW to share you discoveries for a chance to be featured on Friday's episode! And don't forget to send us a photo at tinkercast.com/share!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
